It just annoys me that the minimum settings of the game are so funny, but in fact it turns out that you can't play steadily, although your PC is 3-4 times better. These are constant updates. The developers themselves don't even understand what they are doing. Instead of optimizing the game normally, they release useless operations with skins in order to earn more money. For a game that was made paid and you buy at full price for 13,71$ + rubles for nothing
Thank you very much
